trigger_prototype.name: Door to "{#ELEMENTNAME}" is opened more than 10min

trigger_prototype.expression: ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0 and {Template Vutlan EMS ExtScript:GSMModemValue[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}<{$NETWORK_SIGNAL_LOW_ALERT}) or ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1 and {Template Vutlan EMS ExtScript:GSMModemValue[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}<{$NETWORK_SIGNAL_NORMAL})
trigger_prototype.name: "{#ELEMENTNAME}"'s network signal is low as {ITEM.VALUE1}
Account balance for "{#ELEMENTNAME}" is low that {$BALANCE_LOW_ALERT} ({ITEM.VALUE1})
Warning: Account balance for "{#ELEMENTNAME}" is low that {$BALANCE_LOW_WARNING} ({ITEM.VALUE1})
